title: Bedrich Smetana My vlast cond. V. Talich y.1939 radio broadcast
description:
VÃƒÆ’Ã‚ï¿½CLAV TALICH live 1939 / BEDRICH SMETANA - Ma vlast (My country)

A record of a radio broadcast of the concerts of the National Theatre in Prague broadcated on 5th and 9th June 1939. It is a unique record with an unbelivable atmosphere of the year it was first broadcasted, the year thw WWI started.
It was broadcated again on 14th March 2011 completely in the original form with some contemporary comments at the beginning and at the end.
